data.text: @pinatafarms @wsbtv They should’ve just made him pay a fine and apply for a normal loan lol wtf

@pinatafarms @wsbtv Obviously that’s bad because it was ‘disaster relief funds’ for businesses but maybe his hobby was an unofficial business? It was just a loan he’d eventually pay off. It’s not like he stole the money? idk

@Jermainski @Liberation4LL @pinatafarms @BigBizTheGod @wsbtv Leave it to the Twitter law student to judge punishment on a dude who stole tens of thousands of dollars for a pokeman card. Let’s decriminalize grand theft - great idea fuck head.

Guy can fuck off - you’ll never be shit either.

@Liberation4LL @Jermainski @pinatafarms @BigBizTheGod @wsbtv It’s called scamming you fool
This sets out an example for others like the couple who did the same thing but was over millions of pandemic funds & bought homes and they were in the run for almost a year and were recently caught.
@pinatafarms @wsbtv The crime is not buying a psa 10 after taking that kind of risk.
